website_summaries.verdict: A great collection of eyeshadow shades that can create a variety of looks.
pros: Features 12 different neutral shades in mattes and shimmers
Easy to blend and has good pigmentation
Great for creating full eye looks
cons: Palettes occasionally break while in transit

website_summaries.verdict: The nude shades and quality pigmentation will have you reaching for this palette daily.
pros: A healthy mix of matte and shimmer shades
Highly pigmented color that is easily blendable
A few of the shades work well for filling in eyebrows
Perfect palette for creating natural looks
cons: Shimmer shades tend to crease without eyeshadow primer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite palette!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite eyeshadow palette! That may not be saying much (I own very little makeup), but the shadow is pigmented (especially when wet), easy to apply, and seems to last despite my oily eyelids and prominent hood! I will say that it creases a bit in my hood -- but that's to be expected. I only wish they would offer singles too haha! The shimmery golds and bronzes are nearly tapped out for me because, of all the colors, they are my FAVORITES. I wear them practically every single day. I don't want to buy a whole new palette just for those three though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst package I have ever. Everything falls apart inside the package. You can see from the pictures that the pallete broke into pieces. DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a super basic nude palette to bring on a trip and this is perfect, the applicator that comes with it is more dense but I've also used the product with soft brushes and both work well. I haven't noticed much need for reapplication even without wearing primer so it gets the job done for me. One of the pans was out of place when it arrived but I just popped it back into place and smoothed it down with my fingertip so it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maiya

customer_reviews.title: bad experience
customer_reviews.text: bad experience total waste of money.. had got it for my sister but when it arrived the color palettes were floating inside the box, as u can see in the picture. tried to place a complain but couldn't. this sucks :(
customer_reviews.author: pujan budhathoki

customer_reviews.title: That gold shimmer though. Makes it worth it alone!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these colors for a show that I was in so I chose this palette. Like others said, the colors are surprisingly pigmented and well quality for such a low cost. The lighter colors, mostly the shimmery white is not very pigmented but I don’t really use that one much anyway. The packaging is great, none of my colors have a cracked or broken, and I think it will last me a long time. Plus there is a gold shimmer in the palette and it is so beautiful, I absolutely love it. I also use some of the browns for my eyebrows and it works fantastically
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. I already had one and I bought it as a present for a friend, as she always likes my make-up. I has great, brilliant colors and whatever color you use (the one one that I don't use is the darkest one) it creates a great effect on your eyes, that also last for a long time. It is very cheap and definitely deserves a try. I love it as a kit, I also bought the lipsticks palette by Maybelline and it has exactly the same size, it is just wonderful to see them together one next to each other, and with only them two I can create very different styles for every situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The is a great palette. The colors are not as pigmented as ...
customer_reviews.text: The is a great palette. The colors are not as pigmented as the Urban Decay Naked palette, but this is a good, cheap alternative. I love the gold and brown tones. I prefer to use the shimmery shadows because I think they show up better on my skin. They seem to be easier to build on compared to the more matte shades. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to save money or is just learning how to do makeup. With the right primer, the color will last all day.
customer_reviews.author: B1987

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Walmart's price, so just get from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Hmm... I could pay a high price at Walmart for this, orrrr I could just order it for a lot cheaper on here, and have it delivered. I was smart and chose the latter. We all know this is an awesome alternative to the NAKED palette. The colors are rich, blendable, and stay put through the day There's a lot of options for a neutral look or smokey eyes. Lots of different color combos to try. BUT MOSTLY buy it on Amazon, because it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: LA Camp

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Fixed Issue/ONE HAPPY CAMPER
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered and had eyeshadow broken and all over the product. Amazon was wonderful and is sending a free replacement! I love maybelline! I will always love maybelline products. Great pallette to swatch.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Regular Palette
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this palette and was disappointed that it got damaged during shipping. I like the colors and since only one color got damaged I am not going to return it. It does, however, feel a little cheap. I will see how I like it after I use it for a couple of times, because I do not wear make up every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty decent for the price. The colors are nice and there is a good mix of lights and darks. I find that they don't blend super well, but I wasn't expecting too much in that area anyway. There is some fallout and it can be hard to get the product to stick to the brush, but if you spray it with some setting mist first it works much better. I love this product for my eyebrows as it has two colors that work perfectly for my eyebrow color. We will see how long it lasts, but at the moment I would consider buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great product for anyone that doesn’t care about name brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought it since I wanted a compact eyeshadow pallet for traveling and did not want to spend a lot of money on a new one. I’m not a make up expert and I don’t care about the brand as long as the product works.The shades in this pallet are great, however the pigmentation is not very strong. Make sure to prime your eyelids with a nice primer and it will last all day without creasing. All in all is not a bad pallet if you’re looking for a soft look and wear it with a decent primer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: this palette is beautiful, but the color payoff was not very good ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this palette is beautiful, but the color payoff was not very good for me. I couldn't get the colors to show up, or to blend well and the color was not build able for me. I would pass on this one and go for Milani or BH Cosmetics or colourpop for a similar price. (Heck, even Hush cosmetics is much better) I was pretty let down by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle@Book Briefs

customer_reviews.title: The color payoff is really bad..
customer_reviews.text: The color payoff is really bad....I don't know if it's because I received an old product or maybe it's just like that? I can still get the product on my face but the colors are really light and it takes a couple of applications to get it to show. I guess it's a good thing if you're into a more natural look that you can slowly build. Also side note but I received 2 palettes in my order.
customer_reviews.author: Nic L.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that upon arrival, one color was broken a bit; however, I realize I could have driven a few miles and paid a little more to pick this up from the store. Overall, I love the application of this product, and the colors can be laid out in multiple different quad palettes depending on your desired look.
customer_reviews.author: lnm801

customer_reviews.title: Gread add on
customer_reviews.text: I love maybelline products this is a very good neutral small on the go pallet fit perfect in my purse and the colors was so easy to blend item came in very securely
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting much more based on the reviews. I decided to give it a try since I've just started to learn how to do a proper makeup and didn't want to spend a lot of money on a good palette. The fact is that the shadows don't have much pigmentation at all and the colors are nicer in the pictures than they really are.
customer_reviews.author: LRA30

customer_reviews.title: Too loose and pale
customer_reviews.text: These are great colors and a good combination of frosty and matte, but the product is too powdery and loose when trying to put it on. Not the usual consistency when applying other dry eye shadows I own. It wasn't enough to impress and I can't recommend them. Sad that this is Maybelline.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs McC

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of this
customer_reviews.text: The price is not high. However I bought it because I heard this palette is great and popular. And then I found the powder doesn’t stay on my eye lid for long. And the color is lighter than it looks like. I don’t like it at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Sally melly

customer_reviews.title: Staple makeup item
customer_reviews.text: Great little palette! Maybelline's The Nudes really is a staple in any makeup collection, with it's wide array of shades and limitless combinations. The colors are nicely pigmented and apply smoothly, my personal favorite is the gold one in the second row. The guide in the back is especially helpful, as it gives ideas for looks to wear. These shadows last all day atop ELF's eyelid primer, and I've been complimented on them numerous times since I've worn them out. With its variety and combinations, this is a must have and inexpensive neutral palette suitable for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for half Asian eyes / skin
customer_reviews.text: Great pallette for blending on my half-asian, half white skin. Good range for anything from 'barely there' natural looking daytime makeup to a solid smoky eye.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Hermine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color palette
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this palette. The colors are so pretty. I don't know that much about makeup but this works great for me. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Usable - but not great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, not terrible - but not great either. The darker colors are pigmented and build well, the shimmers look pretty in the tray but require a lot of product to build for an underwhelming payoff, while the lighter colors are useless with hardly any color payoff no matter how much product is used. Oh and this was after using primer and makeup brushes - I'm sure the primer and good brushes helped, but I still felt a bit let down (I had better luck with the City Mini pallets).
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Askham

customer_reviews.title: Another Beautiful Palette from Maybelline
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE all these Maybelline NUDES palettes! This one is gorgeous. Wonderful well pigmented, neutral colors that I think look good with all eye colors. They wear well too. I think I only have two palettes more to have them all. They're getting harder to find though. I hope Maybelline doesn't stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Energy

customer_reviews.title: I got what I asked for and I am very happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to to try eye shadow out for the first time and I think I was fortunate to come across this palette. The colors are nude as they say and they are beautiful. You have the choice of plain or a bit of shimmer for each color. It stays on the whole day. As far as the color opacity I say pack it on twice because just patting normally won't get you much. I have no problem with this though as I like to keep it light.
customer_reviews.author: Nasirah

customer_reviews.title: awesome colors but break
customer_reviews.text: This eye shadow palette is very pretty and with many neutral tones, the price is nice too, very good for the beginners, but the package is not well enough to protect the puff cake inside from break, hope it won't happen next time cuz I like it, bought it to my friends but now I have to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bruce

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't realize there were so many items in this set. They are of good quality. I just wish the number and use for each was printed on the individual brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Goes on very light
customer_reviews.text: Good selection of colors, but I expected colors to apply much truer to how they look like they will than they did. The colors go on very light and are hard to build up. I expected them to be more saturated rather than sheer and found the set disappointing. I bought this palette instead of a more expensive one and realize that I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to cover up my mistakes
customer_reviews.text: I like the highlights. I’m really great at forgetting I have makeup on and rubbing my face. Overall, it smears easily and I have a hard time covering it up when it does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great color palette!
customer_reviews.text: The best! I use this daily and love the color palette. Truly goes well with every skin tone. Some colors are matte, which is my personal preference, and a few are shiny/shimmery. Great for highlighting and drawing attention to your eyes. Easy to dress up with drama, yet natural enough for daytime work use. Applicator is good sized, and swabs stay put nicely. Will buy again. Stays put after hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marchese Crew

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pallet
customer_reviews.text: I have a carmel complexion and read some of the reviews that some of the colors lacked pigmentation. I have experienced that with quite a few eyeshadows I've used in the past, but I did not find this to be the case with this one! I've used all the colors within the span of a few days and they look awesome. I'm really impressed. .I don't want to use any of my other shadows now. I highly recommend this and it gets two thumbs up in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy55

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, the back has instructions too for different ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, the back has instructions too for different ways to apply it. Only comes with 1 applicator, and it's not a brush.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Many Different Looks From Just One Pallete
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous colors, some matte and some shimmery. Very pigmented and last all day. If you're looking to do a simple, natural look, use these. If you want a dramatic smokey eye, use these. If you want anything in between, use these. They are perfect for any occasion and have very simple instructions on how to use. So many different looks with just one pallete. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Good value, purchased them because I am familiar with the brand and they had the right price, good quality eye shadows if you like the brown neutrals.
customer_reviews.author: Canada

customer_reviews.title: I really loved the nude shades in this pallet
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the nude shades in this pallet; you get a good mix of matte and shimmery shades to choose from and on the back of the pallet there are suggestions of different color combinations to use and where to place the colors on the eyelid, making this pallet very user friendly especially for beginners to eye shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Shady Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Like the product very much.
customer_reviews.text: I like the eyeshadows very much . I would have liked a mirror on the case, but that probably would have made it more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Cisco

customer_reviews.title: Great color choices for mature ladies!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this palette. Love the colors and they last as long as I wear a good eyeshadow base.
customer_reviews.author: KC M Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Eyeshadows
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow pallete offers really beautiful neutral eyeshadows. They last all day and look great together with some blending!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it is easy to apply, how often to use or etc. it was for my kid who is a make-up person...loves make-up like many young adults do and she does know how to apply it GREAT...she loves the colors and wears them. I have not heard any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would really love these colours, I tend to prefer mattes to sparkly shadows. The darks are super pigmented. the darkest is almost a black when applied. The light colours are not pigmented at all, there is barely any colour when placed on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I don’t like shimmer as much as most, that’s why I personally gave 4/5. Nothing wrong with it at all as long as you like over half of your pallet to have shimmer. Great value. Long lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great product but lose tabs of eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this before and love the colors and longevity. However, this time one of the tabs of color came loose and keeps falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Reyneke

customer_reviews.title: The colors are not pigmented at al
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst eyeshadow palette I have ever owned. The colors are not pigmented at all. I keep swatching the colors on my eeybrows 4 times, still no color showing. I even used an eye primer, nothing shows up ! What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Manoue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty palette!
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this palette, nice range of colors (neutrals) and a great price! I can't see spending over $50 on Urban Decay or Tarte or some of the more prestigious lines for what are basically earth toned eyeshadows. I use a little primer on my lids, or a dusting of powder, then apply with a brush and VOILA! It's not rocket science, but Maybelline quality is fine. Fun to play with, too. Packaging is plastic but adequate. I do use a good quality makeup brush, not the small sponge brushes that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: CLJ

customer_reviews.title: this is a good option. The colors are highly pigmented which is ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want something that rivals the Naked palettes but don't want to drop $50-$60, this is a good option. The colors are highly pigmented which is nice but they don't blend easily. Also, there's a good mixture of shimmer and matte colors unlike the Naked palettes that have maybe one matte, a couple glitter shadows, and the rest are high shimmer. Unless you like all that shimmer, in which case, get the Naked palettes.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Possible fake
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a fake. I have one I bought from the store a few years back, I used the dark brown shade for the ombré effect on my eyebrows. I recently hit pan and found this one so I ordered it, when it came and I went to use it, the shades weren’t the same shade as my original one. They’re lighter and some are off on color. Couldn’t use it for my eyebrows as planned. The stickers also weren’t on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: My go to eyeshadow. I’ve used this for as long as I can remember and don’t see that changing anytime soon. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great palette
customer_reviews.text: For such an inexpensive palette the colors are awesome and they don’t crumble when you apply them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: disappointed, broken eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these nude eyeshadow colors, and I open the package, take it out of the bubble wrap and its broken! Severely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: A favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and I purchased this awhile back and have still been using almost daily. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AusDarHam

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a nude palette. I don't do my makeup but the rare time I do I use this one!
customer_reviews.author: ashley gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great eye shadow palette!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had anything I don't like about it! Lovely colors and they stay on nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Seth & Natalie F.

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set of neutrals at a reasonable price. It stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite eye shadow pallet.
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite eye shadow pallet. I love it. The colors are beautiful, they go on easy, and you can create SO many different looks from this one pallet. I like to wear a lot of browns and this is perfect for that. This kit can be used for everyday wear and you can also create a beautiful smoky eye if you're going out. I highly recommend this product. It is a tiny bit pricey for drug store makeup but it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Coburns

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty colors, and works great paired with NYX Waterproof Eyeshadow Primer. I think the colors pop more when I use both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Very good for fair skinned, light haired,women like me.
customer_reviews.author: julie d. drake

customer_reviews.title: It's weird because Maybelline has very good products !!
customer_reviews.text: I made expectations with this product but the shadows are of poor quality, have little pigment. I wanted it for travel but it does not work for me ....
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors but requires so much product to be able to see it
customer_reviews.text: This palette is really pretty and quite versatile but if you're a bit tanner like me, the shimmery gold color really needs a LOT of product to see any color at all. Otherwise a great product. I still use it a lot, I just layer it on a lot of times.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I really didn’t like was the applicator that it came with. Otherwise the colors and the texture of the eye shadow was nice and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: aliciajune88

customer_reviews.title: and I love it! For it's price it's pretty pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I own several naked palettes and purchased this via recommendation from a friend since it can fit snuggly in my purse. and I love it! For it's price it's pretty pigmented. Good if you're looking for something with good quality but you're on a budget. I would recommend using your own brushes to apply tho. I didn't like the applicator that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's great quality and the colors glide ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone gave me this product for Christmas. I use it so much each day that I decided to buy a 2nd set. I love it. It's great quality and the colors glide nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and has a good amount of pigment, perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: LEVI

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few Maybelline palettes to try but this is the only one I really liked and wanted to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller

customer_reviews.title: ... it was featured in a makeup tutorial that I liked. The colors looked very powdery when on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was featured in a makeup tutorial that I liked. The colors looked very powdery when on and I ended up going to MAC and getting the colors there to continue the look I had learned. I am a dark skin toned American so this could have look just fine on a lighter individual.
customer_reviews.author: Chocoleon

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors of this palette
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of this palette. The Nudes have every shade that I use (neutral to bold) Application is easy, doesn't smear, does not irritate my eyes. I have this as a subscription item so that I can make sure I have it on stock and never have to run out. From Smoky and Bold to demure...this is my eyeshadow palette....
customer_reviews.author: C. Papin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty meh
customer_reviews.text: Good assortment of colors but the formula is kind of dry and chalky. The pigments arent super bright and seem to cake into the pan quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not as impressed with this as I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Not as impressed with this as I was hoping to be. I am a longtime lover of Urban Decay's Naked palettes and was hoping this would be a cheaper alternative. The color is not nearly as concentrated as UD's and the shadows are always falling out of the palette so it's a bit messy. The old saying you get what you pay for seems to ring true to this product.
customer_reviews.author: BRye

customer_reviews.title: Everyday palette
customer_reviews.text: I really love this nude palette. I have a lot of cheap eyeshadows but this palette by far gets the most use. Because of the nude colors, I can easily do a natural smokey eye during the day and spruce it up at night. I actually also use one of the browns as ab eyebrow filler.
customer_reviews.author: JLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's Maybelline!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always disappointed when eye shadow colors don't look the same when they're applied as they do in the palette. This one wasn't terrible, but if you're looking for that smoky eye appearance, this might not do it for you. It does say "Nudes", I just thought they would be a little darker. I like the colors, but I would like if they were more true.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: On the back it breaks up the colors into blocks and has suggestions of how to use the blocks. I love it! You can really get different looks from each block and the smokey eye look.
customer_reviews.author: BRosenberg

customer_reviews.title: perfect pallette
customer_reviews.text: i loooovee this pallette! the color in the picture is as pretty and exact as in the picture. It is very pigmented and stays on all day long. each color is creamy and does not fall off your skin when applied..This is also perfect for those who don't want to spend much money for urban decay eyeshadows. This Maybelline "The Nude" palllette is awesome. I highly recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wowoo

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors but it came broken. I got it for a Christmas gift for my mom so she had a broken present because I didn't have time to send it back. Other than that it would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Neutral but not boring
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful neutral colors. Perfect for this fair skinned blonde. There is an application guide on the back which is a fabulous if you want to try a new look but aren't sure of how to get started. I am really enjoying this palette! All colors arrived unbroken and was well wrapped by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Need more light shades, but reasonable quality. Guess I could use some of the dsrker shades on my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Tropical Nicks

customer_reviews.title: nice neutral shadows
customer_reviews.text: The shadows blends well and seems to stay put. I like the all the neutral shades...subdued and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: nwh

customer_reviews.title: great colors
customer_reviews.text: so impressed! pretty nuteral colors. from shimmer to flats. loved it. will order again once i use it up
customer_reviews.author: Susan Quinn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great neutral palette at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great neutral palette at a great price! The only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that too many of the shades are metallic for my taste. It would be "mature eye" friendlier if it had more matte shades. That said, there are 2 or 3 colors that I use daily and they are very nice. Not super pigmented, but do stay on well and are not irritating to my sensitive eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Ann Petrone

customer_reviews.title: I like this pallet
customer_reviews.text: I like this pallet. Use primer if you want it to last all day. For me this is great for everyday use since you can use the lighter colors. When I go out you can build the colors and make it more dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: I love both the shimmer and the matte
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the size of this palette, I thought it was going to be a lot smaller. The colors are radiant, I love both the shimmer and the matte. I will definitely be ordering again as the colors fit my eyeshadow style perfectly. They stay on very well too. Definitely recommend for anyone that wants a great nude palette at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Actual color is much darker
customer_reviews.text: The color is much darker in person than what the website indicates. Other than being too dark for me, and not being able to return the item, it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Samec

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, been using this for a while now. Perfect for neutral colors. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lo & El

customer_reviews.title: A gorgeous palette without being outrageously expensive
customer_reviews.text: I’m a makeup minimalist but this palette really amps up my daily makeup look without being too bold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Selection of Colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful selection of colors. Makes it easy to switch up your eyeshadow look.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: not all the colors were as expected when applied- a ...
customer_reviews.text: not all the colors were as expected when applied- a few on the bottom row looked brown in the pan but orangey when applied. found myself only using one or two out of all twelve so i moved to a different palette that had more usable colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little Product!
customer_reviews.text: If you use the instructions on the back of the packaging to apply your eyes will look gorgeous. I have dark brown eyes, and this shadow pallet really makes them stand out. It applies nicely and evenly, and last at least 8 hours. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katanna E.

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors, however, they are not very pigmented so you have to apply several layers. Wetting the brush helps a little. Once applied it does look very nice. It does not flake during application and I have not had any issues with it creasing.
customer_reviews.author: Ammikins

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this palette daily for a little over a year now and I like it. There are a few colors that I won't use because they don't swatch well and don't blend either no matter how much I try. Other than that, it's a nice addition to my makeup case.
customer_reviews.author: WhatWouldLeiaDo

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a neutral pallet and these colors are very nice. Use this weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Summers

customer_reviews.title: Love colors, one came broken.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the colors. I'm going to gift the other one. Only reason I didnt give 5 stars is because one came broken, so I guess I'm keeping that one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: StephiJ

customer_reviews.title: nice neutral palette in excellent range of colors
customer_reviews.text: great, long lasting, blendable, natural looking colors in a very nice range for a palette. i'm fair skinned and all shades look pretty good. it has lasted pretty long too, ive been using it for a few months regularly and haven't hit pan on any colors yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Love these Maybelline pallets
customer_reviews.text: Love these Maybelline pallets. Definitely not high in pigment, except the matte shades, if that's what you are needing. Great for a novice, or someone who just wants a bit of color with many options for flattering combinations.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin m

customer_reviews.title: I like this eye shadow set I bought it again
customer_reviews.text: I like this eye shadow set I bought it again! It's a great set of nude colors it you prefer the natural tones.
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This little pallete is great for on the go and all the colors are pigmented nicely
customer_reviews.author: sydneyY

customer_reviews.title: I do like the brown on the bottom row
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Difinetly have to have the right brush to make it show up. Other than that it's average. Not my going to be my go to by any means. I do like the brown on the bottom row, 4th from the left. I use a damp brush and use it for eyeliner. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Nude in more ways then name
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this product but it just doesn't show up well guess Nude was the perfect name. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pieces Of April

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors and when applying it doesn’t spread all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Mary JME

customer_reviews.title: Finally a true nude for all skin colors.
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty and I really appreciate a make up (and product) that recognizes nude is more than a light tan skin color. People of all colors will be able to use this as a nude pallet and I love that. It came quickly and was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect colors
customer_reviews.text: I really like all of the colors in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Great price, does not last all day and night. Love the colors though.
customer_reviews.author: mdfc

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pallet at first (And actually gave it 4 stars) but had to change it to 2 because i decided after a month or two that i actually only like 2 colors out of 12! the black is great (good pigment matte black) and one of the medium browns are great. everything else is kind of chalky and the pigment is really lacking. there are better drugstore nude palettes out there.
customer_reviews.author: Apeterson27

product_meta.title: Maybelline Eyeshadow Palette, The Nudes
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1| Color:nudes

This 12-shade eyeshadow palette features dazzling colors. From bold beiges and sultry sands to brazen bronzes and tempting taupes, this makeup palette is perfect for creating versatile eye makeup looks.

12-shade eyeshadow palette
13 eyeshadow looks
Duo, trio and quad color combinations
Create bold eye makeup looks

Quads: 1. Color entire eye area. 2. Shade lid. 3. Contour crease. 4. Line around eye. Trios: 1. Color entire eye area. 2. Shade lid. 3. Contour crease. Duos: 1. Shade lid. 2. Contour crease.



BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: THE NUDES EYE SHADOW PALETTE features 12 expertly curated shades for custom eye makeup looks. From bold beiges & sultry sands to brazen bronzes & tempting taupes, this makeup palette is perfect for creating versatile eye makeup looks.
DEFINE YOUR EYE: Maybelline eyeshadow palettes give you high pigment formula with superior blendability. Available in a variety of finishes from matte to shimmer to create just the look you want.”

MAYBELLINE IS THE EYE EXPERT: Whatever your signature eye look, natural or dramatic, Maybelline helps create looks that draw eyes with a broad selection of pencil & liquid eyeliners, highly pigmented eyeshadows, iconic mascara, & eyebrow makeup.

MAYBELLINE HAS WHAT YOU NEED to create any look—foundation, bb creams, concealers, & highlighters for the perfect canvas, eyeshadows, brow pencils, & eyeliners for any eye look & lip products, from showstopping matte lipstick to au natural lip balms.
REMOVE MAYBELLINE MAKEUP WITH MICELLAR WATER: Use Garnier Micellar Water as a gentle makeup remover at night, and as a facial cleanser in the morning to prep skin for Maybelline makeup.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
